## About the Explorer

The **Data Explorer** is a self-service tool for epidemiologists and public health officials to query NMC surveillance data interactively. Use the filters below to build a custom view, then visualise or download the results.

::: {.panel-sidebar}
### Filters
*Interactive selectors will appear here once data integration is complete.*

- **Condition** â€” multi-select from notifiable conditions list
- **Date range** â€” start and end date picker
- **Province** â€” one or more provinces
- **District** â€” auto-filtered by province selection
:::
